Title: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Yuukaku-hen
Description: ['Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke, aided by the Sound Hashira Tengen Uzui, travel to Yoshiwara red light district to hunt down a demon that has been terrorizing the town.']
